links.body: The Tales of Ba Sing Se

value.text: "The Tales of Ba Sing Se" (only appearance)

paragraphs.body: The term "Goat dog" has not been confirmed by official sources.
paragraphs.text: The term "Goat dog" has not been confirmed by official sources.

paragraphs.body: The goat dog is a small, domesticated ${link_0} found in ${link_1}. It is a long-haired, white, ${link_2}-like creature often kept as a pet.
paragraphs.text: The goat dog is a small, domesticated animal found in Ba Sing Se. It is a long-haired, white, dog-like creature often kept as a pet.

paragraphs.body: A goat dog was present when ${link_0} built a new ${link_1} in the ${link_2} of Ba Sing Se for ${link_3}, the zookeeper. When Aang blew his ${link_4} to call for the zoo animals, many domesticated creatures, such as the goat dog and a small child's pet ${link_5}, accidentally responded to the call. The animal appeared in the cage of an ${link_6}, along with several breeds of cats.
paragraphs.text: A goat dog was present when Aang built a new zoo in the Agrarian Zone of Ba Sing Se for Kenji, the zookeeper. When Aang blew his bison whistle to call for the zoo animals, many domesticated creatures, such as the goat dog and a small child's pet cat, accidentally responded to the call. The animal appeared in the cage of an elephant mandrill, along with several breeds of cats.

paragraphs.body: The goat dog has a short, squat build, with a round body supported by stout legs and hoof-like front paws. It has a long, shaggy white coat that covers its entire body aside from its paws. The hair on its face is curtained, splitting at the snout. It has short, erect ears and a brown oval-like nose as well as a long, fluffy tail.
paragraphs.text: The goat dog has a short, squat build, with a round body supported by stout legs and hoof-like front paws. It has a long, shaggy white coat that covers its entire body aside from its paws. The hair on its face is curtained, splitting at the snout. It has short, erect ears and a brown oval-like nose as well as a long, fluffy tail.

paragraphs.body: The goat dog draws influences from a number of small dogs, including the Yorkshire Terrier, Shih Tzu, West Highland Terrier, and the larger Old English Sheepdog, and a small hoofed animal, such as the goat or sheep.
